definition: meager/slight/weak/ungenerous or unkind/frivolous/to despise/to belittle/to look down on/to approach or near

sentences.english: It's very difficult to climb a sheer cliff.
sentences.chinese: 薄綢是一種極薄的絲綢或人造絲織物。

sentences.english: The apples display their milliner' s scraps of ivory silk, rose - tinged.
sentences.chinese: 蘋果花開，展示出一片片染了玫瑰紅的象牙色薄綢。
